recipes.title: Authentic Italian Pasta Carbonara
recipes.summary: Creamy, traditional Italian pasta carbonara with pancetta, eggs, and Parmesan cheese.
recipes.instructions: Cook pasta. Fry pancetta. Mix eggs and cheese. Combine all. Serve immediately.

recipes.title: Fresh Summer Vegetable Salad
recipes.summary: Refreshing summer salad with cucumber, tomatoes, and a light vinaigrette.
recipes.instructions: Chop vegetables. Mix dressing. Combine and serve chilled.

recipes.title: Baked Potato Soup
recipes.summary: Creamy potato soup with bacon, cheese, and green onions.
recipes.instructions: Bake potatoes. Sauté onions and garlic. Add flour, milk, and broth. Simmer. Blend. Add toppings.

recipes.title: Chocolate Avocado Mousse
recipes.summary: Creamy, healthy chocolate mousse made with ripe avocados and cocoa powder.
recipes.instructions: Blend avocados with cocoa, sweetener, and vanilla. Chill and serve.

recipes.title: Lemon Garlic Roast Chicken
recipes.summary: Classic roast chicken with lemon, garlic, and herbs.
recipes.instructions: Season chicken. Add lemon and garlic. Roast at 425°F for 1 hour or until done.

recipes.title: Quinoa Vegetable Stir-Fry
recipes.summary: Healthy stir-fry with quinoa, mixed vegetables, and a flavorful sauce.
recipes.instructions: Cook quinoa. Stir-fry vegetables. Mix sauce. Combine all ingredients.
